name: SidePost
author: Zoran Maric

sections.description:
There are many plugins for adding recent posts in sidebar, I know… But this is my version. Its easy to use and has all the right settings.

For instance, you can choose posts from specific categories, number of posts, thumbnail size, number of words in excerpt…

Technical support

Dear users, this plugin is available for free download. If you have any questions or recommendations regarding the functionality of this plugin (existing options, new options, current issues), please feel free to contact me. I speak serbian and english.
If you notice any bugs in the plugin, you can notify me about it and we’ll investigate and fix the issue then. Please don’t hesitate to contact me.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the folder sidepost to the directory /wp-content/plugins/.
  2. Activate the plugin via the ‘Plugins’ menu in your WordPress admin panel.
  3. You can adjust the necessary settings in your WordPress widget area.
sections.faq:
How to get posts from more than one categorie?

To get posts from more than one categorie, just write more than one ID number and use commas to separate.
